name: TeenyShire
description:
(Now works on mobile and tablet - hopefully)

🟦🟨🟩🦌🏘️🌳🏔️🏰 - your device will need these emojis to play.

Draw a TeenyShire and maximise your score in 11 turns by following the likes of all the different elements.

  • 🗓️ Daily: You're playing the same game as everyone else today, perfect for comparing.
  • 🎲 Random: You're playing a unique game.

📸 Copy and share button: Once you've completed your game, you can share your TeenyShire and score easily.

Note:

  • Nearby: Is the eight surrounding squares.
    • ✅✅✅
    • ✅⬜✅
    • ✅✅✅
  • Touching: Is the four neighbouring squares
    • ❌✅❌
    • ✅⬜✅
    • ❌✅❌
